page.title: 07HOUSING IN PORT GLASGOW
page.content: Most of the{housing}stock in Port Glasgow can be divided into four categories.These are (1)District Council Housing,(2)Scottish Special Association Housing,(3)Owner Occupied, and (4)Privately Rented Houses. The houses in Port Glasgow vary in age and design.A lot of the older houses are tenements which are 30 or more years old.These are tall and contain many individual flats.Newer styles of semi-detached ,terraced and maisonette housing can be found. Many of the oldest houses need a lot of repairs.Most of these buildings have had to undergo drastic repair work and some have just been knocked down to make way for new buildings.
